JD Vance positions himself as heir of the MAGA movement
subhead: The US vice president has made his mark in what is often a thankless role, railing against immigration, placing faith at the heart of his message and playing his part in diplomacy. He is seeking to make his candidacy for 2028 unavoidable – without upsetting Donald Trump.

title: Mexican mayor assassinated during Day of the Dead celebrations
subhead: Carlos Alberto Manzo Rodríguez, the mayor of the Uruapan municipality in the country's western state of Michoacan, was shot dead in the town's plaza in front of a large crowd gathered for Day of the Dead festivities. The attacker was killed at the scene.

title: 'I never eat alone anymore': La Cop1ne, a Parisian community canteen offering a cure for loneliness
subhead: In Paris, the first solidarity canteen run by the Cop1 association opened its doors a year ago. Its mission: to combat food insecurity and social isolation among students.

title: At the Musée Picasso, Philip Guston and the irony of history
subhead: The American painter, a major figure of the second half of the 20th century who moved from figurative art to abstract expressionism, blended biting irony with a critique of American society.

title: China uses subsidies, coercion and propaganda to boost falling birth rates
subhead: After zealously enforcing the one-child policy, the city of Tianmen has made boosting the birth rate a top priority, as fertility continues to decline across China.

title: Senate seat battle in Maine reveals generational rift in Democratic party
